name: Old YouTube mixed with Material Design YouTube
description:
Do you want the old yellow-gradient Subscribe button? Do you want that green rating bar? Well, here you go!
You'll need to use Material Design YouTube in order for this to work properly. (Current YT design coming soonâ„¢!)

additional_info: How To Get Material Design YT ---------------------------------- To get Material Design YT, set the cookie PREF to f1=50000000&f5=30030&f6=404&al=en-US&Code:+f1=50000000&hl=en-US&gl=US and refresh the page.
